posts._title: Nuri Bilge Ceylan – Koza AKA Cocoon (1995)
posts.title: Koza
posts.excerpt: Due to some painful experiences of their past, an old couple at their seventies live separately. One day they come together again. But the meeting which they hope will heal the lingering pain does not give the expected results. – Nbcfilm

posts.title: Lost Book Found
posts.excerpt: The result of over five years of Super-8 and 16mm filming on New York City streets, Lost Book Found melds documentary and narrative into a complex meditation on city life. The piece revolves around a mysterious notebook filled with obsessive listings of places, objects, and incidents. These listings serve as the key to a hidden …
